mapper.insert: insert into Member_tb(id, password, alias, imagePath) values(#{memberId}, #{password}, #{alias}, #{imagePath})
mapper.update: update Member_tb set password = #{password}, alias = #{alias}, imagePath=#{imagePath} where id = #{memberId}
mapper.delete: delete from Member_tb where id = #{memberId} cv
mapper.select: select sum(starPoint)/count(starPoint) As starPoint from evaluation_tb where memberId = #{id}
